channel.title: Upload on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Upload’ Creator and Stars Unpack That Finale Shocker and Ultimate Message About Love, Death and Tech
item.description: Greg Daniels, along with Robbie Amell, Andy Allo and Allegra Edwards, discuss the shocking death and the love stories in the ending of the Prime Video series.

item.title: ‘Upload’ Creator and Stars Unpack That Finale Shocker and Ultimate Message About Love, Death and Tech

item.title: ‘Upload’ Promises One Final Fight to Shutdown Evil in Trailer for Finale Event
item.description: The Prime Video sci-fi comedy from creator Greg Daniels will debut its final season on Aug. 25.
